elements.description:
`<cosmoz-bottom-bar>` is a horizontal responsive bottom toolbar containing items that
can be used for actions.

The items placed inside the `cosmoz-bottom-bar` are distributed into the toolbar in a horizontal container.
If the items do not fit the available width, those that do not fit are placed in a dropdown
menu triggered by a button in the toolbar.

The class specified by the property `toolbarClass` (default `cosmoz-bottom-bar-toolbar`)
is applied to items distributed to the toolbar.

The class specified in the property `menuClass` (default `cosmoz-bottom-bar-menu`)
is applied to items distributed to the menu.

### Usage
See demo for example usage

properties.name: _parentResizable
properties.description: The closest ancestor element that implements `IronResizableBehavior`.

properties.name: _notifyingDescendant
properties.description:
True if this element is currently notifying its descendant elements of
resize.

properties.name: active
properties.description:
Whether the bar is active (shown)
NOTE: This has no effect when `fixed` is `true`

properties.name: fixed
properties.description:
Whether the bar is fixed (and take up space) or shows/hides from the bottom when needed
(Usually fixed on desktop and not mobile.)

properties.name: barHeight
properties.description: Bar height (not used when `matchParent` or `matchElementHeight` is set)

properties.name: matchParent
properties.description: Whether to match the height of parent

properties.name: scroller
properties.description:
Scroller element to listen to when deciding whether or not to show the bar.
Bar will be shown while scrolling up or when reaching bottom

properties.name: hasMenuItems
properties.description: Whether this bottom bar has items distributed to the menu

properties.name: selectedClass
properties.description: Class applied the the selected item

properties.name: toolbarClass
properties.description: Class applied to items distributed to the toolbar

properties.name: menuClass
properties.description: Class applied to items distributed to the menu

properties.name: maxToolbarItems
properties.description: Maximum number of items in toolbar, regardless of space

properties.name: computedBarHeight
properties.description: The actual bar height, depending on if we `matchParent` or set `barHeight`

properties.name: _computedBarHeightKicker
properties.description: Kicker to make `computedBarHeight` recalculate

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Whether the bar is visible (has actions and is `active` or `fixed`)

properties.name: hasActions
properties.description: Whether we have any visible actions

properties.name: _matchHeightElement
properties.description: Reference element from which to inherit height

properties.name: _nodeObserver
properties.description: Non-Polymer properties

methods.name: notifyResize
methods.description:
Can be called to manually notify a resizable and its descendant
resizables of a resize change.

methods.name: assignParentResizable
methods.description:
Used to assign the closest resizable ancestor to this resizable
if the ancestor detects a request for notifications.

methods.name: stopResizeNotificationsFor
methods.description:
Used to remove a resizable descendant from the list of descendants
that should be notified of a resize change.

methods.name: resizerShouldNotify
methods.description:
This method can be overridden to filter nested elements that should or
should not be notified by the current element. Return true if an element
should be notified, or false if it should not be notified.

params.name: element
params.description:
A candidate descendant element that
implements `IronResizableBehavior`.

return.desc: True if the `element` should be notified of resize.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description:
Whether the bar is active (shown)
NOTE: This has no effect when `fixed` is `true`

attributes.name: fixed
attributes.description:
Whether the bar is fixed (and take up space) or shows/hides from the bottom when needed
(Usually fixed on desktop and not mobile.)

attributes.name: bar-height
attributes.description: Bar height (not used when `matchParent` or `matchElementHeight` is set)

attributes.name: match-parent
attributes.description: Whether to match the height of parent

attributes.name: scroller
attributes.description:
Scroller element to listen to when deciding whether or not to show the bar.
Bar will be shown while scrolling up or when reaching bottom

attributes.name: has-menu-items
attributes.description: Whether this bottom bar has items distributed to the menu

attributes.name: selected-class
attributes.description: Class applied the the selected item

attributes.name: toolbar-class
attributes.description: Class applied to items distributed to the toolbar

attributes.name: menu-class
attributes.description: Class applied to items distributed to the menu

attributes.name: max-toolbar-items
attributes.description: Maximum number of items in toolbar, regardless of space

attributes.name: computed-bar-height
attributes.description: The actual bar height, depending on if we `matchParent` or set `barHeight`

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description: Whether the bar is visible (has actions and is `active` or `fixed`)

attributes.name: has-actions
attributes.description: Whether we have any visible actions

elements.description:
`cosmoz-bottom-bar-view` contains a content section and a bottom bar with actions.

__Important:__ Because `cosmoz-bottom-bar-view` is handling scrolling of its content, it must be explicitly sized.
By "explicitly sized", we mean it either has an explicit CSS height property set via a class or inline style,
or else is sized by other layout means (e.g. the flex or fit classes).

properties.name: viewInfo
properties.description:
viewInfo object
{
	desktop: Boolean,
	effects: Number (1-10),
	height: Number,
	landscape: Boolean,
	mobile: Boolean,
	portrait: Boolean,
	tablet: Boolean,
	width: Number
}

properties.name: _parentResizable
properties.description: The closest ancestor element that implements `IronResizableBehavior`.

properties.name: _notifyingDescendant
properties.description:
True if this element is currently notifying its descendant elements of
resize.

properties.name: active
properties.description: Bar-view and bar are active

properties.name: barHeight
properties.description: Height of the bar

properties.name: fixed
properties.description: Fixed bar

properties.name: scroller
properties.description: The scroller for the scrolling part of the view

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Bar is visible

methods.name: notifyResize
methods.description:
Can be called to manually notify a resizable and its descendant
resizables of a resize change.

methods.name: assignParentResizable

Used to assign the closest resizable ancestor to this resizable
if the ancestor detects a request for notifications.

methods.name: stopResizeNotificationsFor

Used to remove a resizable descendant from the list of descendants
that should be notified of a resize change.

methods.description:
This method can be overridden to filter nested elements that should or
should not be notified by the current element. Return true if an element
should be notified, or false if it should not be notified.

params.name: element
params.description:
A candidate descendant element that

return.desc: True if the `element` should be notified of resize.

viewInfo object
{

}

attributes.name: scroller
attributes.description: The scroller for the scrolling part of the view
